comment._content: Wystan:  Thanks for the correction to the caption.  We will fix it.

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: This would be New York City Mayor John Purroy Mitchel.

comment.author: 35072786@N08
comment._content: Yes you are correct Wystan. Mitchel was mayor between 1914 and 1917. We will add his name to the description too.
